misc: This is an e-commerce app for jewelry that I worked on at Akasia/GajiCermat using React Native. I became a key member of the team because I was involved from the start of development and also helped by reviewing code to ensure consistency.

description: An Admin Dashboard created with Next Js
misc: This is an admin dashboard for Nirwana Textile, built with Next.js and Chakra UI as the component library. I developed it from scratch without using any templates, ensuring a fully customized and optimized solution. My decision to avoid templates was driven by a commitment to creating a tailored and high-quality dashboard.

This is an e-commerce platform integrated with company-specific features, built using Next.js and Ant Design as the component library. I developed it with a focus on scalability, efficiency, and a seamless user experience.

description: An Admin Dashboard created with React
misc: This is an admin dashboard for Hallaw, built using React, Ant Design, and Redux/RTK Query for state management and data fetching. I developed this alongside a co-worker, focusing on the application logic, including data consumption and state management.

description: A single page register site with multi step form built with React and Ant Design
misc: I did a complete redesign of this projectâ€”previously, it was just a standard, unremarkable form. I used Zustand to manage the form state and handled data submission to the API with React Query and Axios.

description: An E-Commerce site built with React and Laravel.
misc: I managed two projects here: the admin dashboard and landing page, built with Laravel, and the e-commerce site, developed with React. I was responsible for nearly everything, from selecting the tech stack to handling data consumption.

description: A Company Profile Landing Page that created with React, Next Js and Chakra UI as UI Library
misc: I implemented a design slicing from Figma using Next.js and Chakra UI. It's a single-page application without dynamic data.
